About.title: What is Bullish Bear?
About.content:
The year is 2050. Humans are an interplanetary species and have all but abandoned the post-apocalyptic shatters of society on earth.
Bears have taken over. One crime-ridden, nondescript inner city is inhabited by a group of bears collectively known as the Bullish Bears.
This is their story.

Dividends.content:
Dividends are regular payments of profit made to investors.
Dividends can be issued in various forms, such as cash payment, stocks and in our case crypto-currencies.

2% of the volume generated on opensea will be redistributed holders with a balance of +50 bears.
If you hold more than 50 bears, each additional Bear will increase your share and thus your dividends.

Accumulating +50 bears will guarantee a passive income for decades to come.

For those with less than 50 bears, well, your "common" bears may be more valuable than you think ;)
Floor bears or bears the community find worthless will become extremely valuable in the process.
Dividends will be paid on a weekly basis automatically to wallets holding more than 50 bears.

Roadmap.content:
% of the volume on opensea will be redistributed to holders with a balance of 50+ bears.
Dividends program will be implemented within 3 weeks following the launch.
Note, 2% of the volume generated by opensea will be held in a vault in the meantime.

If you own 1 bear you will be able to mint 1 new NFT from our future 3d metaverse project.
You have to hold Bears in your wallet in order to claim for free.
Bears owners will be airdropped our future 3d project meant for metaverse for free and be eligible to future airdrop, forever.
